pr_title: Fix propagating Otel context to propagate gRPC context

timeline.message:
Fix propagating Otel context to propagate gRPC context

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: From what I understand, we essentially resync gRPC with OTel context any time current is called. And since we naturally can't have implicit context propagation without calling current anyways this covers all use cases. Does that sound right?
timeline.author: anuraaga

replies.bodyText:
Yes. This is similar to otelAsGRPC but instead of getting values from gRPC context using the wrapped keys, you first get our context from there, then use the key to get the value from our context.
We can simplify the code to always call into the gRPC via the extra call I mentioned but that is a bit more inefficient.
replies.author: bogdandrutu
